timeline.message:
Add endpoint for `/eth/v1/beacon/genesis`

- deprecated the previous genesis endpoint `/node/genesis_time`.

 partially addresses #2757

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

tagged syncing endpoint as validatorRequired also.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

implement standard `/eth/v1/beacon/states/:state_id/fork` endpoint

 - deprecated the old `/node/fork` endpoint

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

clean up message passing from path parameters back to the calling function - now using IllegalArgumentException.

 - checked test coverage, and improved a bit.

 - tried to clean up the ChainDataUnavailable exception, but the old api's use a catch all to return a 410 so i can't put a generic handler in for the UnavailableException to return a 503.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

push V1 endpoints up to the top of the documentation

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

implement `/eth/v1/events` endpoint

 - added chain_reorg event listening and publishing.

 - added old and new state roots to the chain reorg event.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into 2754-eventstream

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

# Conflicts:
#	data/beaconrestapi/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/teku/beaconrestapi/BeaconRestApi.java
#	data/provider/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/teku/api/ChainDataProvider.java
#	data/provider/src/test/java/tech/pegasys/teku/api/ChainDataProviderTest.java

add test cases, implement finalized_checkpoint event.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

removed 503, as it no longer returns that.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>
